row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PRV.JOB.BIND_SERVICE@GENERIC
row.description: Bind service instance to an application in Cloud Foundry

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT !------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Authentication Token" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_AUTHTOKEN#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Application Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_APP_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Service Name" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_NAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ PREPARE AUTH DETAILS ---------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.PREP_AUTHINFO :IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 ! -------------------------------------BUILDING INPUT PARAMETER------------------------------------------------ : SET &UC4RB_CF_BIND_SERVICE_CLA# ="cf bind-service " ! Application name : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CF_APP_NAME# : SET &UC4RB_CF_BIND_SERVICE_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_BIND_SERVICE_CLA#, " &UC4RB_CF_APP_NAME#")
! Service name : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE &UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING# = &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_NAME# : SET &UC4RB_CF_BIND_SERVICE_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_BIND_SERVICE_CLA#, " &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_NAME#")
! Config file path ! Write the json input into a file if not empty : IF &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_CONFIG# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_CF_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_HOMEDIR#,&SEPARATOR#) : SET &UC4RB_CF_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_FILE_PATH#, "service-config.json") : SET &UC4RB_CF_FILECONTENTS# = &UC4RB_CF_SERVICE_CONFIG# : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_FILE &UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE# = &UC4RB_CF_FILE_PATH# : IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# <> 0 : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "Unable to create service config file" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR : ENDIF : SET &UC4RB_CF_BIND_SERVICE_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_BIND_SERVICE_CLA#, " -c &UC4RB_CF_FILE_PATH#") : ENDIF
: IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 ! Logging CF command : PRINT "EXECUTING CF BIND_SERVICE COMMAND: &UC4RB_CF_BIND_SERVICE_CLA#" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT( "EXECUTING CF BIND_SERVICE COMMAND: ", &UC4RB_CF_BIND_SERVICE_CLA#) : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO ! ------------------------------------------ INVOKING CF COMMAND LINE ------------------------------------------ &UC4RB_CF_BIND_SERVICE_CLA# : ENDIF :ENDIF
!Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** BIND SERVICE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** BIND SERVICE ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process:
!------------------------------------------ UPDATE AUTH INFO INTO VARA OBJECT ------------------------------------------ : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE")
: IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.UPDATE_AUTHINFO : ENDIF
